Text:
A9 / V8

I've downloaded 5 different uploads of The Purge, this is the only watchable copy on TPB. 

A/V is in sync. Colour is good. None of the film is cut off. Not blurry at all.
Only thing is the Chinese subtitles, but they're small & easy to ignore.

M7 - different to what I expected from the trailer.

Thanks for the great upload!
Something must have happened with my download.. the audio and video sync was way off. I've d/l twice.. same issue. Oh well, I will try another one.
great copy A/8 V/8 thanks subtitles not a problem Thanks
